p: Concentration-dependent killing was observed with pistachio hull EO against all tested strains (Fig. 1 a-c). A good fungicidal effect was achieved after 2 h exposure against C. parapsilosis strain 26 at the concentration of 1 x MIC, whereas the same effect was achieved against C. albicans strain 16 and C. glabrata strain 9 after 8 h exposure. Concentrations of ½ MIC and ¼ MIC exerted a fungistatic effect against all tested strains. As reported in Tables 1 and 2, C. albicans strain 16 was the most resistant.
